title: FRQ Score
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria and/or examples, and to score the response.

General Considerations:

For Task A, the response must correctly describe the informal power used by the president in the scenario.

For Task B, the response must correctly explain how the power described in part A could have impacted Congressional oversight.

For Task C, the response must explain how NASA could have impacted the implementation of the presidentâ€™s agenda described in the scenario.
descriptions: The response accomplishes none of the tasks set by the question prompt.
The response accomplishes one of the tasks set by the prompt.
The response accomplishes two of the tasks set by the prompt.
The response accomplishes three of the tasks set by the prompt.
